name: ODK
description: ODK lets you build powerful offline forms to collect the data you need wherever it is. It is the global standard for offline data collection.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: Data can be exported via the UI and the API in a variety of standard formats.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
typesOfPIIDataCollected: Organizations that use ODK determine what PII is collected and stored. These organizations typically collect demographic data.
dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity:
ODK follows industry-standard best practices to ensure the privacy and security of data. Our practices and policies can be found below. 
Terms of Service: https://getodk.org/legal/tos.html 
Privacy Policy: https://getodk.org/legal/privacy.html 
Business Agreement: https://getodk.org/legal/ba.html 
Data Processing Agreement: https://getodk.org/legal/dpa.html 

ODK software, regardless of if it's self-hosted or running on ODK Cloud, supports end-to-end encryption with self-managed keys as well as role-based permissions. 

Organizations that use ODK Cloud have all their data encrypted in transit and at rest. Our data centers are GDPR compliant and ISO27K, CSA STAR, and SOC 2 certified. 

ODK Cloud data is backed up continuously and can be restored to a specific moment in time. Backups are kept for 30 days.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is collected and stored but NOT distributed.
userContent.contentManagementPolicy:
https://forum.getodk.org/guidelines 

ODK uses a combination of automated and manual systems to detect and moderate inappropriate content. Response time is typically 8 hours. 

https://getodk.org/legal/aup.html
https://github.com/getodk/governance/blob/master/CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md

protectionFromHarassment.harassmentPolicy:
ODK does not identify the target age of our audience, enforce age limits, or provide any parental/guardian controls.,

ODK requires that organizations who use our software comply with applicable laws about underage users.

https://getodk.org/legal/aup.html
https://forum.getodk.org/guidelines
https://github.com/getodk/governance/blob/master/CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md

bestPractices: ODK follows an agile and iterative design process and strive for simplicity

and robustness in the artifacts we create.

ODK has endorsed the Principles for Digital Development.

sdgs.sdg: SDG1: End Poverty in all its forms everywhere
sdgs.relevance:
SDG1: IFRC uses ODK to monitor cash assistance to 1.6M foreigners in Türkiye
SDG2: WFP uses ODK to provide actionable food security assessments.
SDG3: WHO uses ODK to collect millions of data points for disease surveillance.
SDG4: Honduras uses ODK to ensure the education of millions of students.
SDG6: Red Cross uses ODK to improve the efficiency of humanitarian action.
SDG7: Guyana uses ODK to ensure operational efficiency of its power grid.
SDG8: FINCA uses ODK to measure household consumption and job creation.
SDG13: Sierra Leone uses ODK to help plant millions of trees and create jobs.
SDG14: Australia uses ODK to guide the conservation of flatback turtles.
SDG15: Jane Goodall Institute uses ODK to track the health of ape habitat.
SDG16: The Carter Center uses ODK to assess the fairness of elections.
